response.overview: This series was written by Marian Pilot, one of the leading representatives of the so-called 'peasant trend' in contemporary Polish literature. The writer outlined the image of the village at the turn of the 1980s on the example of the Małolepsza family from the village of Gudzewo. They manage a few hectares, the older children left for the city, they settled in, one of the sons even became a lawyer. Twenty-year-old Bolek stayed with his parents, a boy willing to "fight and drink", wandering with his peers as crude as he was, lonely, because most of the girls fled to the city.
response.title: W słońcu i w deszczu
